predicate.note: Frames file for 'sack' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive with adverbials
example.text: First , he unceremoniously sacked Tom Landry , the legendary coach who [*T*-1] took the Cowboys to five Super Bowls and 20 consecutive winning seasons .
example.arg: Tom Landry , the legendary coach who [*T*-1] took the Cowboys to five Super Bowls and 20 consecutive winning seasons
